import tactic --hide

/-

#Goldbach

-/


/- Lemma
If $n$ is even then there exits primes $p,q$ such that $n = p+q$.
-/
lemma Goldbach (n : ℕ) (hn : even n) : ∃ (p q : ℕ) (hp : prime p) (hq : prime q), n = p + q :=
begin
